verification send email Email sent!\nWe can send you an email again in %1$ss verify Please verify your email address by clicking the link we sent. If you don’t see it, check your spam folder.\nAfter following the link, click on the “verify” button.
Something went wrong, please try again later Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain a minimum of 1 numeric character [0–9] Passwords must contain a minimum of 1 numeric character [0–9] Please enter a password Please confirm the password Password mismatch Please enter a valid email address Incorrect Email Address or Password Email is not verified. Please try again later.

Delete the habit Do you want to delete this habit?\nThis action is permanent and cannot be undone. Delete
Archive habit Do you want to archive this habit?\nYou can restore it anytime. Archive
Restore habit Do you want to restore this habit? Restore
App bar titles habit details habit history
icon goal / day %1$d / day tap on the day to update your progress, changes will be saved immediately %1$s / %2$s done color and icon enter a name for the habit color

Settings Enable notifications To receive reminders, please enable notifications in Settings > Notifications
Enable alarms To receive reminders, please enable alerts in Settings > Notifications System Light Dark Theme Backup Mode week starts on sunday highlight current day highlight streaks Archived Current order: by %1$s.\nTo apply order changes, switch to manual sorting.
